name: Auto Image From Title
author: PlentyGram

sections.description: This powerful plugin can save you both time and money, it can automatically insert an SEO optimized image based on the post title. The plugin uses duckduckgo engine to grab and display a related image.
sections.installation:
After installing this plugin you need a working CORS proxy server. There are several ways to get your own CORS anywhere server and you can use Cloudflare to create your own server for free. Once you get your CORS proxy server link you can insert it in the plugin settings page.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 3.8 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
sections.faq:
How to install this plugin?

Installation is very simple after downloading the plugin go to the settings page then add your CORS proxy server link and select which post categories allowed for the plugin.

How to create a free CORS proxy server?

You can create a free CORS proxy server through cloudflare.
sections.changelog:
• Custom CORS proxy server option.
  • Selective plugin activation per post category.

short_description: Automatically add image to WordPress post based on the title using duckduckgo engine.
description: This powerful plugin can save you both time and money, it can automatically insert an SEO optimized image based on the post title. The plugin uses duckduckgo engine to grab and display a related image.
